from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedures_xTab'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedures_xTab_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_Procedure_Update_Part2").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Define update condition (extend this for all 30 procedure codes)
update_condition = " OR ".join([
    f"(COALESCE(src.ProcCode{i}SNOMED, 'X') != COALESCE(tgt.ProcCode{i}SNOMED, 'X')) OR " +
    f"(COALESCE(src.ProcCode{i}CDS, 'X') != COALESCE(tgt.ProcCode{i}CDS, 'X')) OR " +
    f"(COALESCE(src.ProcCode{i}Date, to_date('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(tgt.ProcCode{i}Date, to_date('1900-01-01'))) OR " +
    f"(COALESCE(src.ProcCode{i}Desc, 'X') != COALESCE(tgt.ProcCode{i}Desc, 'X'))"
    for i in range(1, 31)
])

# Define update set (extend this for all 30 procedure codes)
update_set = {
    f"ProcCode{i}SNOMED": f"src.ProcCode{i}SNOMED",
    f"ProcCode{i}CDS": f"src.ProcCode{i}CDS",
    f"ProcCode{i}Date": f"src.ProcCode{i}Date",
    f"ProcCode{i}Desc": f"src.ProcCode{i}Desc"
    for i in range(1, 31)
}

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    source_df.alias("src"),
    "tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid"
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set=update_set
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values=update_set | {"visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid"}
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")
